game.name: : Emulation Tools
game.desc: This folder contains emulator related scripts.

game.name: Configuration Editor
game.desc: Change common RetroArch options, and manually edit RetroArch configs, global configs, and non-RetroArch configs.

game.name: ✭ Install or Update AM & HW Video Encoding
game.desc: It will install or update your Attract Mode, SFML-Pi & FFMPEG with mmal HW Video Encoding Support. To Enable mmal you need also to set it in the attract.cfg in the general section 'video_decoder mmal'. Can be done also while in AM by pressing TAB.

game.name: ES Pathfinder Custom Collections, CG-2P!
game.desc: CygeGhost final release! It compares custom imported collections (by other users) with your Romsets. It will automatically correct paths. If there are more than one possible hit, then you can choose out of a selection of ROMs. Standard & advanced search options.

game.name: ES Collection List Generator, DM-2P!
game.desc: This will add or update the custom collection gamelist that will be used to show games in the custom collections menu items.

game.name: ✭ Controller Selection Script, Meleu
game.desc: Lets the user define which controller to use for RetroArch players 1-4, global and system specific. The joystick selection has two methods of work: 1) selection by joystick index and 2) by joystick name.

game.name: LightGun Aimtrak Install, EZH
game.desc: Enabled on PlayBox! Enables Aimtrack Lightgun support and installs Advance-Mame v1.4. Mouse is supported on PlayBox for both Advance-Mame & lr-mame systems/emus.

game.name: LightGun Aimtrak Config, EZH
game.desc: The configuration script created by the Aimtrak script.

game.name: Reicast Date & Time, RG-2P!
game.desc: This will enable or disable date & time setting when Reicast starts by forcing an older patched reicast binary. Reicast binary by jonsim.

game.name: ✭ Retroarch
game.desc: Launches the RetroArch GUI so you can change RetroArch options. Note: Changes will not be saved unless you have enabled the "Save Configuration On Exit" option.

game.name: RetroArch Net Play
game.desc: Set up RetroArch Netplay options, choose host or client, port, host IP, delay frames, and your nickname.

game.name: Saves Single Folder, RPC
game.desc: Not enabled on PlayBox! Creates a "saves" directory at ~/RetroPie/saves and configures all RetroArch emulators with their own config files to store savefiles at ~/RetroPie/saves/{system_name} and savestate files at ~/Retropie/saves/{system_name}/states.

game.name: XinMo & Juyao Dual, 2P!
game.desc: Enable XIN MO or JUYAO dual Arcade player support as per official Wiki.

game.name: : Network Tools
game.desc: This folder contains network related scripts.

game.name: Bluetooth
game.desc: Register and connect to Bluetooth devices. Unregister, remove devices and display registered & connected devices.

game.name: What is my IP?
game.desc: Displays your current IP address, as well as other information provided by the command, "ip addr show."

game.name: : System Tools
game.desc: This folder contains system related scripts to set or adjust settings.

game.name: : HDMI Audio Fixes, EZH
game.desc: This folder contains HDMI audio fix related scripts from EazyHax Toolkit.

game.name: No Audio Fix - Apply 1st!
game.desc: Try first this HDMI configuration audio fix.

game.name: No Audio Fix - Force 720p
game.desc: Second HDMI configuration audio fix.

game.name: No Audio Fix - Force 1080p
game.desc: Third HDMI configuration audio fix.

game.name: : USB Modes
game.desc: Enable USB Boot Mode to boot a USB burned image without the need of the SD card or enable-disable your external USB ROMS HDD/SSD.

game.name: USB Boot Mode, 2P!
game.desc: Pre-enabled on PlayBox. This enables the permanent USB Boot Mode on Pi3B Model. You can boot a USB device with no SD card needed or any further changes.

game.name: USB Roms On/Off, EZH-2P!
game.desc: Dual script! You can choose to expand the roms file system to an external USB MSD or disable it. External MSD needs to be in NTFS format. Note: When you change ext USB you need to run removal script and then connect and enable the new drive.

game.name: Audio Settings
game.desc: Configure audio settings. Choose default to Auto, 3.5mm Jack or HDMI. Mixer controls, and apply default settings.

game.name: Background Music Setup, EZH-2P!
game.desc: Enabled on PlayBox! You can remove or re-install the background music. If removed, run the relative fix in PlayBox Toolkit to disable BGM when an emulator starts. NOTE: It won't delete your music folder!

game.name: File Manager
game.desc: Basic ASCII file manager for Linux allowing you to browse, copy, delete and move files.

game.name: ✭ OverClock Optimized, RPC-2P!
game.desc: Overclock your Pi3B or Pi3B+ with N64 optimization in mind. Two settings for Pi3B+ (1500/1550) and one for Pi3B (1300). Original code by RPC.

game.name: Reference Utility Menu, DM
game.desc: Find out common information about Retropie, Emulation Station, Attract Mode, RetroArch and ROM information.

game.name: ✭ Reset All Controllers, 2P!
game.desc: It will reset all ES cotroller configurations and remove any previous controller profiles. This will give you a clean controllers setup!

game.name: ✭ Update & Upgrade OS, 2P!
game.desc: You can update and upgrade your OS in one click!

game.name: : Visual 'n' Theme Tools
game.desc: This folder contains the Skyscraper install/update script, bezels and other visual settings.

game.name: Bezel Project, The
game.desc: Pimp your PlayBox. Use the official Bezel Project to enable/disable systems and roms fantastic bezels. A great team behind it. Fully automated!

game.name: Bezel Custom Sets, DM-2P!
game.desc: You can enable or disable custom folder bezels such as Motion Blue #2 set or future sets by 2Play!.

game.name: Mp4 Launching Screens, 2P!
game.desc: Disable or enable 2Play!'s launching mp4 screen prior loading a rom. Or enable the launching mp4 screens per system. Requires the systems mp4 to exist in the RetroPie/extras+/mp4 folder and match PlayBox system names.

game.name: ES Themes
game.desc: Install, uninstall, or update EmulationStation themes. Officialy supported themes can be previewed at https://github.com/retropie/RetroPie-Setup/wiki/themes.

game.name: OverScan On/Off, EZH-2P!
game.desc: This script will let quickly enable or disable the overscan setting.

game.name: Media Removal Util, DM-2P!
game.desc: This utility will remove extra media files (mixart, boxart, cartart, snap and wheel) for a chosen system when there is not a matching game/rom for it. Mixart tweak added.

game.name: ✭ Skyscraper 2P!
game.desc: A powerful and versatile yet easy to use game scraper. Supports EmulationStation & Attract Mode, 61+ systems. Written by Lars Muldjord. Script by 2Play! to install or update the Skyscraper to latest release. To run actual Skyscraper use PlayBox Toolkit from cli.

game.name: RetroArch Shaders On/Off
game.desc: Enable or disable your RetroArch shaders.

game.name: Splash Screens
game.desc: Enable or disable the RetroPie splashscreen during boot. Choose a splashscreen, download new splashscreens or return splashscreen to default.

game.name: Music On/Off, EZH
game.desc: Mute or unmute the background music.

game.name: Raspi-Config
game.desc: Expand your SD card filesystem, overscan, memory split, SSH, VNC remote access, change user password, boot options, system configuration, localization configuration, camera, add your pi to Rastrack map and more.

game.name: RetroPie Setup
game.desc: Official Retropie Setup script! Audio settings, RetroPie main install-update, install extra packages, additional drivers, edit samba shares as well as other RetroPie-related configurations.

game.name: ✭ Switch To Attract Mode
game.desc: Enable and switch to Attract Mode FrontEnd.

game.name: ✭ PlayBox Toolkit
game.desc: Fix all your broken PlayBox features. Update, maintenance tools and many more. This PlayBox Toolkit runs also from cli so you can use Skyscraper and open Raspbian desktop.

game.name: Hursty's Themes
game.desc: Install, uninstall, or update RetroHursty69's EmulationStation themes. David Marti's randomizer ES theme script is part of this script.

game.name: RunCommand Settings
game.desc: Change what appears on the runcommand screen. Enable or disable the menu, enable or disable box art and change CPU configuration.

game.name: WiFi
game.desc: Connect to or disconnect from a wifi network and configure wifi settings. On Pi3B+ you might need to set location.

game.name: System Info, 2P!
game.desc: View a summary of your PlayBox system info, temperature, partition info, ip, etc.!
